mainHeroDesc: Mind, Character, Community: Themes of a DGS Education

HomePage.title: Hello world!
HomePage.studentWellBeing-1: DGS maintains strong safeguarding and child protection policies & procedures, this ensures that our students can pursue their education in a safe, secure, and caring environment.

MetaData.title: DGS School
MetaData.description: DGS Adventure is an international division under The Dewey Schools located in Hanoi serving local students from diverse backgrounds. We pride ourselves on providing a progressive, concept-based, inquiry-driven program that focuses on the 'delta' -- the moment of change, growth or transformation.
